@dev a list for each token and each user that has deposited some of that
 token into the bank
@dev a list of all supported tokens
@dev a ledger of the amount of each token in the bank

@dev method that will withdraw tokens from the bank if the caller
 has tokens in the bank
@dev method to deposit tokens into the bank
@dev function that will add a token to the list of supported tokens
@dev function that will remove token from list of supported tokens
@dev method that will show the total amount of tokens in the bank for

@dev method that will show the balance that the caller has
 for a certain token
@dev fallback function to receive any eth sent to this contract

attributes.text:
@dev a list for each token and each user that has deposited some of that
 token into the bank
@dev a list of all supported tokens
@dev a ledger of the amount of each token in the bank

@dev method that will withdraw tokens from the bank if the caller
 has tokens in the bank
@dev method to deposit tokens into the bank
@dev function that will add a token to the list of supported tokens
@dev function that will remove token from list of supported tokens
@dev method that will show the total amount of tokens in the bank for

@dev method that will show the balance that the caller has
 for a certain token
@dev fallback function to receive any eth sent to this contract

addToken(string,address).details: function that will add a token to the list of supported tokens

balanceOf(string).details: method that will show the balance that the caller has for a certain token

deposit(string).details: method to deposit tokens into the bank

removeToken(string).details: function that will remove token from list of supported tokens

totalTokenSupply(string).details: method that will show the total amount of tokens in the bank for

withdraw(string,uint256).details: method that will withdraw tokens from the bank if the caller has tokens in the bank

_tokenSupply.details: a ledger of the amount of each token in the bank

tokenOwnerBalance.details: a list for each token and each user that has deposited some of that token into the bank

tokensAllowed.details: a list of all supported tokens
